Class MatrixOperations

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.MatrixOperations
public class MatrixOperations extends Object
This class is used in manipulating the matrix operations.

This is a static utility class.

This class is responsible for:

  • Checking for intersections between bricks and the game board
  • Managing and updating the game matrix
  • Copying matrix data

  • Method Details

    • intersect

      public static boolean intersect(int[][] matrix, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Determines whether a given brick intersects with a matrix at a specific position.

      An intersection occurs if:

      • Any non-zero cell of the brick overlaps with a non-zero cell in the matrix
      • Any part of the brick is placed out of the matrix bounds
      Parameters:
      matrix - the game board matrix, where each element represents a block or empty space
      brick - a 2D array representing the brick shape
      x - the x-coordinate (row index) in the matrix to place the top-left corner of the brick
      y - the y-coordinate (column index) in the matrix to place the top-left corner of the brick
      Returns:
      true if the brick collides with the matrix or is out of bounds; false otherwise

    • copy

      public static int[][] copy(int[][] original)
      Creates a deep copy of a 2D integer matrix.
      Parameters:
      original - the original 2D matrix
      Returns:
      the copy of the original matrix

    • merge

      public static int[][] merge(int[][] filledFields, int[][] brick, int x, int y)
      Merges a brick into a matrix at a specified position without modifying the original matrix.

      This method creates a copy of the given matrix and inserts the brick's shape data at the provided (x, y) coordinates.

      Parameters:
      filledFields - the original game matrix to copy
      brick - the brick that is to be merged into the matrix
      x - the x-coordinate where the brick's top-left corner will be placed
      y - the y-coordinate where the brick's top-left corner will be placed
      Returns:
      2D matrix representing the game state with the brick merged

    • checkRemoving

      public static ClearRow checkRemoving(int[][] matrix)
      Checks for fully completed rows in the matrix, removes them, and computes the corresponding score bonus.

      Each row that is completely filled is cleared. The cleared rows are removed from the matrix, the remaining rows are shifted down, and empty rows are added at the top.

      The score bonus is calculated as 50 * (number of cleared rows)^2. A line-clear sound effect is played for each cleared row.

      Parameters:
      matrix - the game board matrix
      Returns:
      ClearRow containing the cleared row data

    • deepCopyList

      public static List<int[][]> deepCopyList(List<int[][]> list)
      Creates a deep copy of a list of 2D matrices.

      Each matrix in the list is individually copied so that modifications to the returned list do not affect the original matrices.

      Parameters:
      list - a copy of the matrix
      Returns:
      a new list containing deep copies of the matrices
